Title: ClikinBacon (Automated cursor control testing utility)
Description: Automated testing utility that controls the mouse cursor and simulates clicks via a macro language.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Automated testing utility that controls the mouse cursor and simulates clicks via a macro language. The testing utility also contains a recorder that will generate the macro language for later replay or editing.

Note: For all math operation; I am referencing the NCalc project library (https://ncalc.codeplex.com/) under the MIT license.
